entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Cypress Hills (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:18 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cypress Hills Provincial Park 11:00 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: 1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 81 %
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: W 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
